info.title: JSON Content Object
info.description: Creates a json content object for async communication.

method.name: addHeader
method.description: Adds a header to the report.

parameter.name: $key
parameter.description: The header key value. If set, the content will be available at the given key, otherwise it will inserted in the array with a numeric key (next array key).

method.name: addReportContent
method.description: Adds a report data content to the server report.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The report content data in array form.

parameter.name: $key
parameter.description: The content key value. If set, the content will be available at the given key, otherwise it will inserted in the array with a numeric key (next array key).

method.name: addReportAction
method.description: Adds a report action content to the server report.

parameter.name: $value
parameter.description: The action value (if any, empty by default).

parameter.name: $key
parameter.description: The action key value. If set, the content will be available at the given key, otherwise it will inserted in the array with a numeric key (next array key).

method.name: getReport
method.description: Returns the JSON Report for this data content.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The report content data in array form.

parameter.name: $allowOrigin
parameter.description: The allow origin header value for the ServerReport response headers. If empty, calculate the inner allow origin of the framework (more secure). It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $withCredentials
parameter.description: The allow credentials header value for the ServerReport response headers. It is TRUE by default.

parameter.name: $key
parameter.description: The content key value. If set, the content will be available at the given key, otherwise it will inserted in the array with a numeric key (next array key).
